oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: My Make Believe performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of My Make Believe, written by Charlie Craig and Jim Colvard, and performed by an unidentified male voice with band accompaniment. Recording is most likely a demo performance.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: [Cedarwood Publishing letterhead] "My Make Believe" lyric sheet [typed] and [Audie Ashworth of Moss Rose Publications letterhead] pitch letter dated 1970-01-27 and addressed to Eddy Arnold [handwritten] stored with transcription documents, Box 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Craig, Charlie, 1938-2011; Colvard, Jim
